SEARCH
Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog

Class CourseCatalog

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog.CourseCatalog
public class CourseCatalog extends Object
CourseCatalog class uses a SortedList of courses that make up the catalog it can make a new catalog, load courses from a file, add courses to catalog, remove and get courses from catalog,and get and save the course catalog.
Author:
Dreese Abdelilah

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Course Catalog constructor that constructs an empty catalog

  • Constructor Details

    • CourseCatalog

      public CourseCatalog()
      Course Catalog constructor that constructs an empty catalog

  • Method Details

    • newCourseCatalog

      public void newCourseCatalog()
      newCourseCatalog constructs an empty catalog

    • loadCoursesFromFile

      public void loadCoursesFromFile(String fileName)
      LoadCoursesFromFile loads course records into the catalog and any file not found exceptions are caught and an IllegalArgumentException is thrown to the client
      Parameters:
      fileName - fileName with a type String
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if fileName is invalid

    • addCourseToCatalog

      public boolean addCourseToCatalog(String name, String title, String section, int credits, String instructorId, int enrollmentCap, String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      add CourseToCatalog adds course to catalog and returns true. but if it returns false if the course already exists in the catalog. and throws an illegal argument exception if there is an error constructing the course.
      Parameters:
      name - Course name
      title - Course Title
      section - Course section
      credits - Course credits
      instructorId - Course instructor id
      enrollmentCap - Enrollment cap for the Course
      meetingDays - Course meeting days
      startTime - Course start time
      endTime - Course end time
      Returns:
      true if adds Course and false if Course already exists
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if error constructing Course

    • removeCourseFromCatalog

      public boolean removeCourseFromCatalog(String name, String section)
      remove course from catalog and will return true and false if course is not in the catalog
      Parameters:
      name - course name
      section - course section
      Returns:
      true if the course is removed and false if the course is not in the catalog

    • getCourseFromCatalog

      public Course getCourseFromCatalog(String name, String section)
      Get course from catalog returns the course from the catalog with the given name and section. and returns null if the course is not in the catalog
      Parameters:
      name - string name input
      section - string section input
      Returns:
      Course or null

    • getCourseCatalog

      public String[][] getCourseCatalog()
      getCourseCatalog returns the name, section, title and meeting information for courses in the catalog
      Returns:
      a 2D string array of the courses in the the catalogs name, section, title, and meeting information

    • saveCourseCatalog

      public void saveCourseCatalog(String fileName)
      saveCourseCatalog saves the catalog course records to the given file and any IOExceptions are caught and an IllegalArgumentException is thrown to the client
      Parameters:
      fileName - String that gets passed through
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - The file cannot be saved
